original_text: Naphtali did not drive out the inhabitants of Beth-shemesh, or the inhabitants of Beth-anath, so they lived among the Canaanites, the inhabitants of the land. Nevertheless, the inhabitants of Beth-shemesh and of Beth-anath became subject to forced labor for them.
korean_text: 납달리는 벧세메스 주민과 벧아낫 주민을 쫓아내지 못하고 그 땅의 주민 가나안 족속 가운데 거주하였으나 벧세메스와 벧아낫 주민들이 그들에게 노역을 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Naphtali did not drive out the inhabitants of Beth-shemesh,
so they lived among the Canaanites,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 가나안 사람들 가운데 살았으니,

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless, the inhabitants of Beth-shemesh and of Beth-anath
became subject to forced labor for them.
